Key Match Events: Jackson Tchatchoua went close on 58 minutes with a shot that flew just wide of the post
Bryan Mbeumo tested Maova at his near post on the hour mark
Aboubakar pounced on the rebound to open the scoring on 70 minutes
Aboubakar missed a golden opportunity to score again in the closing stages
Pre-Game Insights: Marc Brys had made an unbeaten start to his tenure after registering a 4-1 win over Cape Verde and a 1-1 draw with Angola in June’s 2026 World Cup qualifiers
The Indomitable Lions struggled in the opening 45 minutes, although they got their act together in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: Deon Hotto was presented with a golden opportunity to equalise in stoppage time but his shot went wayward to the relief of Onana and company
Miscellaneous Highlights: Peter Shalulile threatened early with a shot for Namibia
Edward Maova kept out Carlos Baleba’s fiercely-struck effort from range on six minutes
Andre Onana ensured that the score remained goalless at the break
